sections.title: Overview
content: The Smart & Sustainable Energy Systems Lab is dedicated to advancing research, education, and innovation in modern energy systems.
Our work spans power systems, renewable integration, grid resilience, and interdisciplinary collaboration.

sections.title: Mission & Vision
content: Our mission is to accelerate impactful discoveries that shape the future of sustainable and resilient energy infrastructure.
Our vision is to be a leader in energy systems innovation by fostering collaboration between academia, industry, and government.
